page.title: 10A DAY IN THE LIFE OF PAUL
page.content: A typical Saturday for me starts at 8.45am.Last Saturday was a sunny day so I put my shorts and T-shirt on.I had breakfast of grapefruit,Ricicles and toast.At ten o'clock I went out on my bike to Penrhyn Bay and back.At half past twelve I had a snack lunch.Then I went to my bedroom and played some "Shadows"music whilst playing with my Matchbox cars. At two o'clock I went into the garden to play football and rounders with my brother Adam and his friend Martin. Later I went out on my bike again.I went to Hotel 70 Degrees and returned a different way.At five o'clock I had my tea of rump steak and vegetables, with Black Forest Gateau for sweet.I sat down in the lounge for the evening and watched television and at eight thirty I went to bed.
